The release of the FBI: s two-part summary of its investigation into Hillary Clinton's use of a private email system.
The disclosure by Clinton: s office that she gave the State Department 30,490 work-related emails and deleted 31,830 personal emails.
The revelation that the personal emails: 31, 2015, shortly after Clinton was served with a congressional subpoena.
The clarification that the term: acid wash" used by Trump to describe the deletion process is incorrect, as no chemicals were used and the software used to delete the emails is free.
